lines.text: If you fall out of bed again the cockroaches are gonna start talkin.
[after having sex in a car lot]
That was more fun than eating cotton-candy barefoot.
So you're a tough guy, huh?
No, you're the tough guy. I'm worse.
There's only two things to do in this town. You got a TV?
Well then, you're down to one. Lotsa luck!
